name: Saint James
descriptions: Saint James is a slaver living in Westside in 2281.
Saint James, together with his partner Dermot, used to work as a prospector scavenging around New Vegas, but in secret has turned to slavery by selling refugees as slaves to the Fiends.

On top of his psychosis, Saint James is an active pedophile. He is only kept manageable by a teddy bear from a little blonde girl that they kidnapped, originally part of one of the missing families from Aerotech Office Park, that Dermot bribed him with to keep him away from the "merchandise."
Keeping himself from molesting children is not the only use for the teddy bear, as it has been a regular accessory to his sessions with Sweetie, his favorite prostitute.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: {saying the minimum, guarded}Me and Dermot work salvage around New Vegas.

topics.topic_text: Some people have gone missing, and they were last seen dealing with you.
topics.response_text: {irritated}I don't know a thing about no missing refugees from that Aerotech camp. Go cry to somebody else.

topics.topic_text: I found this ledger in Dermot's room.
topics.response_text: You got his book?{shouting for Dermot as you attack player}Dermot, this bastard got your book! He got your book!

topics.topic_text: Look what I found in your room. <Show him the teddy bear.>
topics.response_text: {unstable, bungling your lies}What you doing stealing my stuff? That ain't even mine. I mean it's mine, but it's private. Give it back!
{bungling your lie}Yeah, well, I must've heard rumors, and, uh...{losing patience}fuck you! You got nothing on me and Dermot.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Dermot, your partner.
topics.response_text: {unstable and not especially bright}What do you even mean? He's Dermot.

topics.topic_text: I hear you spend most of your caps on Sweetie.
topics.response_text: That's private. I don't go asking about how you like to get laid, and I don't wanna know. Enough of that.
